alert.note: Alert for Conecuh; Covington; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 25 at 2:24AM CST until January 25 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Escambia County in south central Alabama... Southeastern Conecuh County in south central Alabama... West central Covington County in south central Alabama... Northwestern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... North central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 300 AM CST. * At 224 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Century, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brewton, Century, Flomaton, East Brewton, Jay, Pollard, Riverview and Bratt. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for south central Alabama...and northwestern Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for south central Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
